description.value:
Your healing energies linger after you cast, providing continual benefits.

An ally that recovers Hit Points from your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Lay on Hands] gains 10 temporary Hit Points at the start of their turn during each of the next 10 rounds. This effect ends if the ally is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Unconscious].

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Spell Effect: Rejuvenating Touch]
